meanings.definition: Having control or power over others.
meanings.sent1: The dominating lion scared away all the other animals.
meanings.sent2: She has a dominating presence in the boardroom.
meanings.sent3: The dominating cat made all the other pets follow its orders.
meanings.sent4: His dominating performance in the game left the opponents in awe.
meanings.sent5: The dominating storm clouds covered the entire sky, blocking out the sun.

meanings.definition: Exercising a commanding influence over others.
meanings.sent1: The dominating leader inspired everyone with his speeches.
meanings.sent2: Her dominating personality drew people towards her.
meanings.sent3: The dominating chef made everyone crave his dishes.
meanings.sent4: The dominating music filled the room, capturing everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The dominating mountain stood tall, casting a shadow over the valley.

meanings.definition: Being the most prominent or influential.
meanings.sent1: The dominating figure in the painting caught everyone's eye.
meanings.sent2: The dominating company in the industry set the trends.
meanings.sent3: The dominating student always aced every exam effortlessly.
meanings.sent4: The dominating skyscraper towered over the city skyline.
meanings.sent5: The dominating aroma of fresh bread filled the bakery, enticing customers.
